detectors.description: PurchaseValidator.isPurchaseValid(address,uint256[],uint256[],uint256[],uint256[],uint256,bytes) (src/StarterPack/PurchaseValidator.sol#33-47) calls keccak256(abi.encodePacked()) with multiple dynamic arguments.
